name: Blink of Destruction
description: One unexpected day, suddenly a mysterious meteorite hits the earth causing damage to buildings and people dying from the hit.  People thought that was it, unfortunate event but at least nothing happened but they were wrong.  Scientist missed very crucial thing, a unknown creature has entered the earth along with the meteorite. one of the victim was a family of four - parents, brother and a sister. They were attacked in the middle of the night, the brother painfully watched his family dying while holding his breath. The boy was infected by the presence of the creature but mysteriously he was immune to it unlike the soldiers who tried to stop the creature but couldn't. NOW HE CARRIES HIS RAGE IN REVENGE OF KILLING ALL THE CREATURE
